## Library Tidyverse

```{r tidyverse, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
```

## Installing penguin package

```{r df_create, echo=FALSE}
install.packages("palmerpenguins")
```
## Loading penguin dataset

```{r df_create, echo=FALSE}
data("penguins", package = "palmerpenguins")
```

## Data Description 
This data presents demographically relevant information for 344 samples of penguins between 2007-2009, including heir bill length and depth, flipper length, body mass, and sex. This is organized in a 344 x 8 table and contains `r nrow(penguin)` and `r ncol(penguin)`. It measures 344 samples and 8 variables.
